DamageResistances: Bludgeoning, Slashing and Piercing from non-magical weapons
Languages: Understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

Traits.Name: Evasive Presence
Traits.Content: Window Knockers can use their spectral nature to avoid detection, granting them advantage on Stealth checks and making them immune to Opportunity Attacks.

Traits.Name: Haunting Code
Traits.Content: When a tool or a window is knocked upon by a Window Knocker, the sound resonates in a manner that can be perceived by living beings up to 120 ft. away, instilling unease and vigilance.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Window Knockers make two Knocking Slaps and one Haunting Raps.

Actions.Name: Knocking Slap
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) damage. This attack deals psychic damage as the echoes of the raps invade the target's mind, causing disorientation.

Actions.Name: Haunting Raps
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 6) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn, haunted by the rhythmic echoes of the knocks.

Actions.Name: Cacophony of Knocks (Recharge 5-6)
Actions.Content: The Window Knockers create a chilling echo in a 15-foot cone. Each creature within that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 40 (9d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The sound resounds like a multitude of knocks, causing unease and paranoia.
